entry.title: Bamboo Cotton Nursing Pads - Pack of 6
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cool Straw
Type:
Price: 9.99

Nursing pads absorb milk that may leak between feedings. It is also common for your milk to leak if you hear a baby crying or it is close to the time your baby would normally feed.¬†

Avoid using disposable nursing pads¬†that contain absorbent chemicals¬†and¬†lack proficient air circulation, which can lead to discomfort and trapped moisture. Breast infections thrive in moist environments;¬†the more you leak the more you need to replace your¬†disposable pads, which is¬†very costly.

Because they are made of natural fibers, cloth nursing pads provide better air circulation, which is necessary to aid in the sore nipple healing process.

100% ECO FRIENDLY BAMBOO COTTON is natural, antibacterial and super soft against your most sensitive skin.

Easy to wash with your baby's clothes,¬†Reusable¬†Bamboo Cotton¬†Nursing pads are designed for eco-conscious parents who¬†are thinking about the planet they leave for their child.

    Includes:¬†6 Bamboo Cotton Nursing Pads - 5" diameter¬†
    1 Cotton Mesh Storage/Laundry Bag
